displayName.japanese: ハード パンチャー

description.english: Melee 5 soldiers
description.french: Attaquez 5 soldats au corps à corps
description.german: Bestehen Sie im Nahkampf mit 5 Soldaten.
description.italian: Attacca 5 soldati in mischia
description.japanese: 兵士を 5 人殴る
description.portuguese: Melee 5 soldados
description.spanish: Lucha cuerpo a cuerpo contra 5 soldados.

displayName.japanese: エース ストライカー

description.english: Punt 20 Bombas
description.french: Lancez 20 bombes
description.german: Platzieren Sie 20 Bomben.
description.italian: Lancia 20 bombe
description.japanese: ボマを 20 個キック
description.portuguese: Punt 20 Bombas
description.spanish: Despeja 20 bombas.

description.english: Get 50 headshots
description.french: Réalisez 50 tirs en pleine tête
description.german: Erzielen Sie 50 Kopftreffer.
description.italian: Effettua 50 colpi alla testa
description.japanese: ヘッドショットを 50 発決める
description.portuguese: 50 headshots
description.spanish: Haz 50 disparos a la cabeza.

displayName.japanese: スクリーム キラー

description.english: Get 100 soldiers to scream
description.french: Faites hurler 100 soldats
description.german: Bringen Sie 100 Soldaten zum Schreien.
description.italian: Fai urlare 100 soldati
description.japanese: 100 人の兵士を断末魔の叫びとともに倒す
description.portuguese: Faz 100 soldados gritar
description.spanish: Haz gritar de dolor a 100 soldados.

displayName.japanese: ブラックバード キラー

description.english: Destroy the helicopter attacking the vice president
description.french: Détruisez l'hélicoptère qui attaque le vice-président
description.german: Zerstören Sie den Helikopter, der den Vizepräsidenten angreift.
description.italian: Distruggi l'elicottero che attacca il vicepresidente
description.japanese: 副大統領を攻撃しているヘリコプターを破壊
description.portuguese: Destrói o helicóptero que ataca o Vice-Presidente
description.spanish: Destruye el helicóptero que ataca al vicepresidente.
description.tchinese: 击落袭击副总统的直升机

description.english: Kill a soldier with a Bomba
description.french: Tuez un soldat à l'aide d'une bombe
description.german: Töten Sie einen Soldaten mit einer Bombe.
description.italian: Uccidi un soldato con una bomba
description.japanese: 兵士をボマで倒す
description.portuguese: Matar um soldado com uma Bomba
description.spanish: Mata a un soldado con una bomba.

displayName.japanese: ウォーター ウォーカー

description.english: Make it from one end of the lake to the other in hyperspeed
description.french: Parcourez le lac d'une extrémité à l'autre en hypervitesse
description.german: Schaffen Sie es in Hypergeschwindigkeit von einem Ende des Sees zum anderen.
description.italian: Vai da una parte all'altra del lago con l'ipervelocità
description.japanese: 湖の端から端までハイパー スピードで駆け抜ける
description.koreana: 초고속 이동으로 호수 한쪽 끝에서 맞은편 끝까지 달리십시오.
description.portuguese: Atravessar o lago de uma ponta à outra a uma velocidade hiper-rápida
description.spanish: Ve de una orilla a otra del lago usando hipervelocidad.

description.english: Complete the game on any difficulty setting
description.french: Terminez le jeu, quelle que soit la difficulté
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel auf einem beliebigen Schwierigkeitsgrad.
description.italian: Completa il gioco a qualsiasi livello di difficoltà
description.japanese: 任意の難易度でゲームをクリア
description.portuguese: Terminar o jogo em qualquer nível de dificuldade
description.russian: Закончи игру с любыми настройками сложности
description.spanish: Completa el juego en cualquier nivel de dificultad.

description.english: Complete the game with 100% of the items
description.french: Terminez le jeu avec 100 % des objets
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel mit 100% gesammelter Objekte.
description.italian: Completa il gioco con il 100% degli oggetti
description.japanese: アイテム回収率 100% でゲームをクリア
description.portuguese: Terminar o jogo com 100% dos itens
description.spanish: Completa el juego con el 100 % de objetos.
description.tchinese: 拾取 100% 道具物品完成游戏

description.english: Complete the game with less than 13% of items
description.french: Terminez le jeu avec moins de 13 % des objets
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel mit weniger als 13% gesammelter Objekte.

description.russian: Закончи игру с менее чем 13 % предметов
description.spanish: Completa el juego con menos del 13 % de objetos.
description.tchinese: 拾取不足 13% 道具物品完成游戏

displayName.japanese: トレーニング マスター

description.english: Complete the three challenge packs in the Proving Grounds
description.french: Terminez les trois packs de défis sur les Terrains d'essai
description.german: Meistern Sie die 3 Herausforderungspacks in den Proving Grounds.
description.italian: Completa i tre pack sfida in Area di allenamento

description.portuguese: Terminar os três pacotes de desafios nos terrenos de testes
description.russian: Заверши три набора особых миссий на полигоне
description.spanish: Completa los tres paquetes de desafío en los campos de pruebas.

description.english: Level up to experience level 50
description.french: Atteignez le niveau d'expérience 50
description.german: Erreichen Sie Erfahrungsstufe 50.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello di esperienza 50
description.japanese: レベル 50 に到達
description.portuguese: Aumentar o nível de experiência para 50
description.spanish: Sube tu nivel de experiencia a 50.

description.english: Turn on your flashlight
description.french: Allumez votre lampe torche

description.japanese: フラッシュライトを点灯
description.portuguese: Ligar a tua Lanterna
description.spanish: Enciende tu linterna.

description.english: Knock back enemies 1 kilometer total with melee attacks
description.french: Projetez des ennemis sur une distance totale de 1000 mètres à l'aide d'attaque au corps à corps
description.german: Schlagen Sie die Feinde mit Nahkampfangriffen 1 Kilometer zurück.
description.italian: Fai indietreggiare i nemici con attacchi in mischia per 1 chilometro in totale
description.japanese: 近接攻撃で敵を合計 1 キロ跳ね飛ばす
description.koreana: 근접 공격으로 적병을 총 1 킬로미터 밀쳐내십시오.
description.portuguese: Faz recuar o inimigo 1 km com ataques de multidão
description.russian: Врукопашную отбрось врагов в сумме на 1 километр
description.spanish: Lanza a los enemigos a 1 kilómetro de distancia con combates cuerpo a cuerpo.

description.english: Kill 200 soldiers with a gun emplacement
description.french: Tuez 200 soldats à l'aide d'une tourelle
description.german: Töten Sie 200 Soldaten mit einer Geschützstellung.

description.portuguese: Matar 200 soldados com uma colocação de arma
description.spanish: Mata a 200 soldados con un emplazamiento de arma.

displayName.japanese: アルファからオメガへ

description.spanish: Completa la armadura Omega.

displayName.japanese: スパイダー キラー

description.english: Defeat a Spidertank by drowning it
description.french: Éliminez une tarentule en la noyant
description.german: Vernichten Sie einen Spinnenpanzer durch Ersäufen.

description.spanish: Vence a un tanque araña ahogándolo.

description.english: Defeat a Devastator with a foam grenade

description.english: Run 10 kilometers total in hyperspeed
description.french: Parcourez un total de 10 km en hypervitesse

description.english: Take 20 rides on the mine cart

description.german: Retten Sie Claire.
description.italian: Salva Claire
description.japanese: クレア救出
description.portuguese: Salvar Claire
description.spanish: Rescata a Claire.

displayName.italian: Per i giudici è un bel 10.0
displayName.japanese: パーフェクト スコア

description.english: Do a triple jump
description.french: Réalisez un triple saut
description.german: Legen Sie einen Dreifachsprung hin.
description.italian: Esegui un triplo salto
description.japanese: 3段ジャンプする
description.portuguese: Fazer um salto triplo
description.spanish: Haz un salto triple.

description.english: Level up to experience level 10
description.french: Atteignez le niveau d'expérience 10
description.german: Erreichen Sie Erfahrungsstufe 10.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello di esperienza 10
description.japanese: レベル 10 に到達
description.portuguese: Aumentar o nível de experiência para 10
description.spanish: Sube tu nivel de experiencia a 10.

description.english: Do 5 consecutive headshots without reloading or taking damage
description.french: Réalisez successivement 5 tirs à la tête sans recharger ni subir de dégâts
description.german: Erzielen Sie 5 Kopftreffer ohne Nachladen oder Schaden zu nehmen.
description.italian: Esegui 5 colpi alla testa consecutivi senza ricaricare o subire danni
description.japanese: リロードもダメージもなく、ヘッドショットを 5 連発決める
description.koreana: 재장전이나 피해를 입지 않고 헤드샷을 5 연속 성공시키십시오.
description.portuguese: Dar 5 headshots consecutivos sem recarregar ou sofrer danos
description.russian: Сделай 5 выстрелов в голову подряд без перезарядки или получения ущерба
description.spanish: Haz 5 disparos consecutivos a la cabeza sin recargar ni sufrir daños.
description.tchinese: 无装弹或受伤情况下连续 5 次爆头

description.english: Perform each type of melee attack (Dropkick, Hanging Takedown, Drop-down Takedown, Double Takedown)
description.french: Effectuez chaque type d'attaque au corps à corps (saut chassé, élimination suspendue, élimination fracassante, double-élimination)
description.german: Führen Sie alle Nahkampfangriffe aus (Dropkick, Hanging-Takedown, Drop-down-Takedown, Doppel-Takedown)
description.italian: Esegui tutti i tipi di attacco in mischia (Calcio volante, Atterramento da appeso, Atterramento in caduta, Doppio atterramento)
description.japanese: あらゆるタイプの近接攻撃を行う (ドロップキック、ハンギング テイクダウン、ドロップダウン テイクダウン、ダブル テイクダウン)
description.koreana: 각종 근접 공격을 가하십시오 (드롭킥, 매달려 테이크다운, 낙하 테이크다운, 더블 테이크다운).
description.portuguese: Realizar todos os tipos de ataques de multidão (Salto/pontapé de cima, Derrube de inimigo suspenso, Derrube com salto, Derrube duplo)
description.russian: Выполни все виды атакующих приемов (удар при падении, бросок с зависанием, выпадающий бросок, двойной бросок)
description.spanish: Ejecuta cada tipo de ataque cuerpo a cuerpo (patada voladora, eliminación colgante, eliminación desde arriba, eliminación doble).
description.tchinese: 全套近战格斗技（反弹踢、背摔、过肩摔、两连摔）

displayName.japanese: フック、ライン、シンカー

description.english: Kill an enemy with the Hookshot.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi à l'aide du crochet.
description.german: Töten Sie einen Feind mit dem Haken.
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico con il gancio
description.japanese: 敵を倒してフックを取る
description.portuguese: Matar o inimigo com um pontapé nos genitais, por trás.
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo con un disparo de gancho.

description.english: Complete the final fight in less than 1 minute 30 seconds.
description.french: Terminez le combat final en moins de 1 minute 30 secondes.
description.german: Gewinnen Sie den Finalkampf in weniger als 1 Minute und 30 Sekunden.
description.italian: Completa la battaglia finale in meno di 1 minuto e 30 secondi
description.japanese: 最後の戦いを 1 分 30 秒未満でクリア
description.koreana: 최종 전투를 1 분 30 초 안에 끝내십시오.
description.portuguese: Acaba a luta final em menos de 1 minuto e 30 segundos.
description.russian: Закончи финальный бой менее чем за 1 минуту 30 секунд.
description.spanish: Completa el combate final en menos de 1 minuto y 30 segundos.
description.tchinese: 在 1 分 30 秒内完成最终对抗

displayName.japanese: ジェイソン ベイリー

description.english: Complete the game at 100% in under 2 hours on any difficulty
description.french: Terminez le jeu à 100% en moins de 2 heures, quelle que soit la difficulté
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel auf 100% in weniger als 2 Stunden auf einem beliebigen Schwierigkeitsgrad.
description.italian: Completa il 100% del gioco in meno di due ore e a qualsiasi livello di difficoltà
description.japanese: アイテム回収率 100％ で 2 時間以内にゲームをクリア (難易度：任意)
description.koreana: 난이도에 상관 없이 2시간 이내에 100%를 달성하고 게임을 완료하십시오.
description.portuguese: Acaba o jogo a 100% em menos de 2 horas em qualquer dificuldade
description.russian: Менее чем за 2 часа закончи игру на 100 % на любом уровне сложности
description.spanish: Completa el100 % del juego en menos de 2 horas en cualquier dificultad.
description.tchinese: 不限难度，在两小时内拾取 100% 游戏道具并完成游戏

description.english: Complete the game at 100% in under 3 hours on insane
description.french: Terminez le jeu à 100% en moins de 3 heures en mode Folie totale
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel auf 100% in weniger als 3 Stunden auf
description.italian: Completa il 100% del gioco in meno di tre ore al livello di difficoltà Folle
description.japanese: アイテム回収率 100％ で 3 時間以内にゲームをクリア (難易度：Insane)
description.koreana: 마스터 난이도에서 3시간 이내에 100%를 달성하고 게임을 완료하십시오.
description.portuguese: Acaba o jogo a 100% em menos de 3 horas em Loucura
description.russian: Менее чем за 3 часа закончи игру на 100 % на уровне «Псих»
description.spanish: Completa el 100 % del juego en menos de 3 horas en dificultad demencial.
description.tchinese: 疯狂难度，在三小时内拾取 100% 游戏道具并完成游戏

description.english: Complete the game at 4% with only the Flashlight, Backpack, Grenade, Foam and Missile
description.french: Terminez le jeu à 4 % avec torche, sac à dos, grenade, fusil à mousse et missile
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel auf 4% nur mit Taschenlampe, Rucksack, Granate, Schaum und Rakete.
description.italian: Completa il 4% del gioco solo con: torcia, zaino, granate, fucile schium. e missili
description.japanese: アイテム回収率 4％ (フラッシュライト、クライミングギア、グレネード、フォームガン、ミサイルのみ) でゲームをクリア
description.koreana: 손전등과 등반 장비, 수류탄, 거품 총, 미사일만 소지하고 4%만 달성한 채로 게임을 완료하십시오.
description.portuguese: Acaba o jogo a 4% com apenas a Lanterna, Mochila, Granada, Espuma e Míssil
description.russian: Пройди 4 % игры только с фонариком, ранцем, гранатой, пеной и ракетой
description.spanish: Completa el 4 % del juego únicamente con la linterna, la mochila, la granada, la espuma y los misiles.
description.tchinese: 只用手电筒、背包、手榴弹、泡棉弹和飞弹，即 4% 游戏道具并完成游戏

displayName.french: Mise à jour du statut : célibataire

description.english: Complete the game by abandoning Claire to her fate
description.french: Terminez le jeu en abandonnant Claire à son sort
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel, indem Sie Claire ihrem Schicksal überlassen.
description.italian: Completa il gioco abbandonando Claire al suo destino
description.japanese: クレアを見捨ててゲームをクリア
description.koreana: 클레어를 구하지 않은 채로 게임을 완료하십시오.
description.portuguese: Acaba o jogo abandonando a Claire ao seu destino
description.russian: Закончи игру, бросив Клер на произвол судьбы
description.spanish: Completa el juego abandonando a Claire a su suerte.

description.english: Complete the game with 8 Health Packs, 19 Grenade Packs, 20 Foam Packs and 9 Missile Packs (8/19/2009)
description.french: Terminez le jeu avec 8 améliorations de santé, 19 packs de grenades, 20 packs de mousse et 9 packs de missiles (8/19/2009)
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel mit 8 Gesundheitspacks, 19 Granatenpacks, 20 Schaumpacks und 9 Raketenpacks (8/19/2009)
description.italian: Completa il gioco con 8 pacchetti salute, 19 pacchetti granata, 20 pacchetti fucile schiumogeno e 9 pacchetti missile (8/19/2009)
description.japanese: ヘルス パック x 8、グレネード パック ｘ 19、フォーム パック ｘ 20、ミサイル パック ｘ 9 をゲットしてゲームをクリア (8/19/2009)
description.koreana: 거품탄 20 팩, 미사일 09 팩, 체력 8 팩, 수류탄 19 팩을 가지고 게임을 완료하십시오. (2009/8/19)
description.portuguese: Acaba o jogo com 8 pacotes de saúde, 19 pacotes de granadas, 20 pacotes de espuma e 9 pacotes de mísseis (8/19/2009)
description.russian: Закончи игру с 8 комплектами здоровья, 19 комплектами гранат, 20 комплектами пены и 9 комплектами ракет (8/19/2009)
description.spanish: Completa el juego con 8 paquetes de salud, 19 paquetes de granadas, 20 paquetes de espuma y 9 paquetes de misiles (8/19/2009).
description.tchinese: 只用 8 个生命值背包、19 个手榴弹背包、20 个泡棉弹背包和 9 个飞弹背包，并完成游戏 (8/19/2009)
